title-group.article-title: Sobolev-Type Approximation Rates for Divergence-Free and Curl-Free RBF Interpolants

abstract.p: Recently, error estimates have been made available for divergencefree radial basis function (RBF) interpolants. However, these results are only valid for functions within the associated reproducing kernel Hilbert space (RKHS) of the matrix-valued RBF. Functions within the associated RKHS, also known as the "native space" of the RBF, can be characterized as vector fields having a specific smoothness, making the native space quite small. In this paper we develop Sobolev-type error estimates when the target function is less smooth than functions in the native space.
